title: Suspect charged with endangering welfare of child, making false - KMOV.com
content:
During the early morning hours on July 27, authorities responded to the 3700 block of Wisconsin and were told the two were injured during a drive-by shooting.
Upon further investigation, police said, it was revealed that the two sustained the injuries after the suspect discharged a firearm in their direction while they were lying in bed.
Tony Young, 21, is charged with endangering the welfare of a child and making a false report.
